tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Review: Nokia Lumia 900
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis:
Nokia Lumia 900: http://goo.gl/0t4AT
GoToMyPC: http://goo.gl/RhNTM
In this video, I review the Nokia Lumia 900. Is this the Windows Phone for you? Watch and find out!
Get the Official SoldierKnowsBest Apps:
iPhone: http://goo.gl/LSSIa Android: http://goo.gl/ixIoT
FaceBook Fan Page: http://goo.gl/pZsjC Google+: http://goo.gl/P972A Twitter: http://twitter.com/soldierknowbest
New Gaming Channel: http://youtube.com/beatsoldierwin Website: http://soldierknowsbest.com

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: $460 in Cambodia :D﻿ hakse.com.kh
Obama!!﻿
and still faster than the quad core Android phones! I'm sorry my OS doesn't require insane specs to run at﻿ an acceptable speed.
Its a good phone,and i think Nokia mobile is largely used by ladies so i﻿ am going to buy it for my wife.
Thank you﻿
0:34 did﻿ he really just say that?
My uncle and cousin have droid, and all of them get the same﻿ thing for apps, force the app to close, freezing, etc, Windows phone 7.5 is amazing and windows phone 8 will be even better
Busta﻿ rhymes
Noaki is the best mobile phone manufacturer. I only buy Nokia and﻿ have never regret it.
0:34; talk about tactlessness﻿ hahahaha
A major revamp? Let's see, they added a few stock apps, updated the﻿ maps app, and didn't touch the UI. OMG, REVOLUTIONARYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYY
Never owned a smartphone before, is this﻿ a goodone if you have a budget?
fanboy?you yourself﻿ are a fanboy.
you still use that? if not, can﻿ I have it? :)
lol honestly, if you comment something about how android is better than windows phone on a video﻿ thats ABOUT windows phone, you probably wouldnt expect any thumbs LOL but i do like andoird too :)
The only problem with a windows﻿ phone is the app market is limited
"oh oh we got a fanboy here" * Proceeds﻿ to act like a fanboy* -__-
it's the top-end WP7 handset so not really, if you want budget Windows﻿ Phone wait until version 8 comes out which will allow for much cheaper hardware to be used
still﻿ more stable and faster than android
Hi SoldierKnowBest ! You speak very faster and I like your video ! I want Nokia Lumia 900 but not enough money...nevermind but i still support Nokia Lumia 900﻿ .

You're an idiot. TechnoBuffalo is a site regarding the whole line of products and every little bit of news that pop up. His channel, as stated on his site, is mainly focused on APPLE products. Would you mind finding the closest well and throw yourself in there for me? I am sure the world would be a so much better place without a person﻿ like you roaming around...
How much does it﻿ cost right now?

Reviewer.Movies: AVATAR, robin hood, spiderwick, national treasure

Reviewer.Books: Atlantis the Antediluvian World by Ignatius Donnelly,History of Atlantis,Atlantis in America,Problem of Lemuria,Problem of Atlantis,Will Europe follow Atlantis? all by Lewis Spence, Touching from a Distance (biography about Ian Curtis and Joy Division), The Sheltering Sky by Paul Bowles and A Passage to India.
Reviewer.Music: Joy Division-Echo & the Bunnymen-SWEET-The Associates-Buzzcocks-Magazine-Luxuria-The Cure-The Babys-The Pretenders-Screaming Blue Messiahs-Bauhaus-Siouxsie and the Banshees--Manic Street Preachers-Bang Gang-Flesh for Lulu-The Divine Comedy-Smashing Pumpkins-Talking Heads-Blondie-Cheap Trick. Australian artists: The Church-The Angels-Mi Sex- Icehouse-INXS(up to the release of Shabooh Shoobah)-Cold Chisel-Serious Young Insects-Kids In The Kitchen-Little Murders-Little Heroes-The Kevins-Jo Jo Zep & the Falcons-Sherbet-Skyhooks-Renee Geyer-Jon English

Reviewer.Movies: AVATAR, robin hood, spiderwick, national treasure
